Title: Take My Work Wife... Please
Plot: Andy tries to prove a rumor is false in which he is having an affair with a coworker. Elsewhere, Bobby's family is making a disaster of the wedding plans; Kenny's winning streak when it comes to romance continues; Brendan works as a temp at a mail room; and Stephanie's new book includes references of the gang.
GuestStars: Aimee Garcia, Derek Johnson, J. P. Manoux, Nia Vardalos
